name: Scuba Adventure: Philippines
description: Race the clock in Scuba Adventure VR as a marine biologist tagging creatures before your oxygen tank runs out of air. Navigating an underwater world in the Philippines, you will come face to face with a dumbo octopus, clownfish, shark, sea turtle, dolphin, lobster, and get dangerously close to venomous marine snails. Earn extra points for tagging venomous creatures whose deadly toxins may unlock the secrets to saving human lives. This game was created by an award winning team that includes a practicing marine biochemist and was developed with support from the National Science Foundation!
